My Work

Check out some of my projects

FamilyHealth

Family Health is an app that manages all your family health information in one secure place. A Family can register, login and add members. Each member of the family can add their health providers, insurance information, medication, lab results and take notes. The Family Health app was created using JavaScript, Postgres, and Mustache-express.

Check it Out

TICKETR

Ticketr is a help desk support ticketing system that manages customers queries. It was built using Firebase Realtime Database to store and sync users and administrators in realtime. We also used JAVASCRIPT, HTML5, Bootstrap and CSS.

Check it Out

MEALSEARCH

Mealsearch is an website where you can search for recipe depending on what you have in your kitchen. You can search for an ingredient and view the recipes and you have the option of watching a Youtube video. It is built using Vanilla JavaScript, CSS, HTML. I also use the mealdb API as well as the Youtube API.

Check it Out

SpeechTextReader

SpeechTextReader is a website/app that uses Web Speech API to incorporate speech synthesis and text-to-speech. It is built using Vanilla JavaScript, CSS, HTML. This is a practice project, however, the reason I created the application is because I have come across numerous people who are not able to communicate their needs. This app has images with representative text on the bottom and it speaks the text when the button is clicked.

Check it Out
